item.title: Ditch MAMP on Snow Leopard
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I was fond of the stack XAMPP offered when I developed on Windows and lazily continued used XAMPP/MAMP once I moved to a Mac OS X based workstation.

item.title: How to undo a SVN commit from the command line
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: SVN 1.4 added a feature to support easy rollback of a SVN commit.

item.title: Import GnuCash data into MoneyDance
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: GnuCash served me well while I was running Ubuntu as my primary desktop but since moving to a Mac Pro I've been disappointed in the performance and non-native nature of the GnuCash Mac port.

item.title: Customize article row count for Cerberus public knowledgebase community
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I've been evaluating the opensource Cerberus Helpdesk as an alternative to the closed source Kayako esupport.

item.title: Resolving a 'CA key usage check failed: keyCertSign bit is not set' error in Tomcat
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: After installing a new GoDaddy SSL certificate in Tomcat 5.

item.title: Compiling mod_caucho on RHEL 5.3
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: There is a known issue with APR that prevents the compilation of mod_caucho on RHEL 5.

item.title: Spring Security ACL intercept-methods with transaction advice
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I recently used Spring to configure a manager to use Spring Security ACL method-level authorization.

item.title: OpenSSL alert 40 Handshake error 'no common encryption algorithms' with Caucho's Resin
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: Setting up my new QA server should have been simple, but a cryptic issue with Resin cost me five hours.

item.title: Resolve foreign key constraint error/conflict with DBUnit CLEAN_INSERT operation (MySQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException)
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: If DBUnit starts throwing MySQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException while performing a CLEAN_INSERT you can lose quite a bit of sleep attempting to resolve it or you can cheat and get back to work.

item.title: Using jQuery and Scriptaculous/prototype together
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: Congratulations to the jQuery crew for properly documenting this one in their official documentation.
